page.title: 12TRANSPORT FOR RIPPINGALE
page.content: Many people have expressed regret at the{closure of railway lines}between Bourne and surrounding towns such as Sleaford,Boston and Grantham.Our nearest mainline stations are now at Peterborough and Grantham and require a change of buses to reach them.{Bus {services,too,are greatly diminished and leave non-car owners,particularly the elderly and the young,somewhat isolated.The number of{cars and {lorries}on the road has increased accordingly and has largely contributed to changing the peace and tranquillity of village life but,at the same time,enabling many to use their leisure time visiting and enjoying the surrounding amenities. {Cycling,}too,is still a fairly common activity on our flat fenland roads.
